text: is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Tanaka was born in Osaka Prefecture on May 26, 1997. After graduating from Osaka University of Health and Sport Sciences, he joined J1 League club Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo in 2020. He played many matches as center back from first season. In December 2019, when Tanaka was a Osaka University of Health and Sport Sciences student, he was selected the Japan national team for 2019 E-1 Football Championship. title: Shunta Tanaka
